title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 220-3.8 - Opacity Limits for Asphalt Mixture Manufacturing Plants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 220-3.8 - Opacity Limits for Asphalt Mixture Manufacturing Plants

State Regulations
(a) No facility owner or operator shall cause
or allow emissions to exceed an average opacity of 20 percent or greater during
any six consecutive minutes from any process emission source or emission
point. Notes
